bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Pad Mounted, Dry Vault, Submersible Fault, and Overhead Fault Interrupters for alternating current systems up to 38 kV
IEEE Draft Standard for Pad Mounted, Dry Vault, Submersible Fault, and Overhead Fault Interrupters for alternating current systems up to 38 kV

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Required definitions, ratings, procedures for performing design tests and production tests, and construction requirements for pad-mounted, dry vault, submersible, and overhead fault interrupters for alternating current systems up to and including 38 kV are provided in this standard.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
